H0.text: Copper is strong is the statement that best explains why electrical wires are made of copper.

H1.text: Copper is flexible, which explains why electrical wires are made of copper.

H2.text: Copper is a conductor, which best explains why electrical wires are made of copper.

H3.text: Copper is an insulator is the statement that best explains why electrical wires are made of copper.

A4.text: Copper is a soft, malleable, and ductile metal with very high thermal and electrical conductivity.

A5.text: Copper's superior conductivity enhances the efficiency of electrical motors.
